Subseries IV.C Office of Victoria Wagner - editorial and publicity departments
Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Subseries IV.C Office of Victoria Wagner - editorial and publicity departments

Workshop materials, press releases, clippings, and copies of school publications. Materials for the ESC Reporter Editorial Policy Committee and the News and Information Committee. Also includes a small amount of clippings 1929-1946.
